VirtualKeyboardHide.summary: NOTE Experimental The hide() method of the interface programmatically hides the on-screen virtual keyboard. This is useful when the page needs to implement its own virtual keyboard logic by using the {{domxref("VirtualKeyboard_API", "VirtualKeyboard API", "", "nocode")}}.

remarks.para: This method only works if the currently-focused element's virtualKeyboardPolicy attribute is set to manual and inputmode isn't set to none.
The hide() method always returns undefined and triggers a event.

-{{domxref("VirtualKeyboard_API", "The VirtualKeyboard API", "", "nocode")}}
-Full control with the VirtualKeyboard API
